description:
Memoir is the best way to relive and share your photos and memories. 

See interesting photos from the past and get all those photos your friends took and never shared with you! 

You'll be able to relive your photos and memories from over the years from your camera, Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and Foursquare. 

All of your photos and memories are 100% private, and only you can see and share them. 

Have questions, qualms, or feedback? Please contact us at feedback@yourmemoir.com
releaseNotes:
- Yay. Search for photos and memories near you really easily. Just tap "My Memories" then "Nearby." 
- Derp. Fixed issues with Facebook log in and some other minor bugs. 

~~~~
What's New in 2.1
- Sync your photos from Dropbox 
- Save photos in your Memoir to your camera roll 
- See, share, and delete individual tweets and Facebook posts

*If you're loving Memoir, please take 2 minutes to leave a review. It's super helpful for other users.
